name: TheMagicianOfJustice
description:
What kind of game is this?


White Master is a first person 3D single player RPG game that does not include any videos. Players enter the corresponding area by selecting levels on the map, defeat monsters, and obtain various props and talents. Each prop has different abilities, and each character will have different growth according to different attributes. Each battle has different experiences, and the overall game is full of exploration and gameplay research of the character. Difficulty of operation?
The operation is simple, but players need to think deeply and choose the appropriate method to defeat monsters based on their existing abilities. The operation key is [Skill] QERT; [Mobile] WASD; [Backpack] C; [Map] P; [Jumping] Space; 【 Perspective 】 Fixed mode: Rotate the character and perspective when pressing the right mouse button, free perspective: Rotate the perspective freely, rotate the character when pressing the right mouse button;



Hope you have a happy game!
